Data Add On Load.description: Adds a function to be called when form data is loaded.

Data Get Is Dirty.description: Gets a boolean value indicating whether the form data has been modified.

Data Get Is Valid.description: Gets a boolean value indicating whether all of the form data is valid. This includes the main entity and any unbound attributes.

Data Refresh.description: Asynchronously refreshes and optionally saves all the data of the form without reloading the page.

Data Remove On Load.description: Removes a function to be called when form data is loaded.

Data Save.description: Gets a boolean value indicating whether the form data has been modified.

Data Entity Add On Save.description: Adds a function to be called when the record is saved.

Data Entity Get Data Xml.description: Returns a string representing the XML that will be sent to the server when the record is saved. Only data in fields that have changed are set to the server.

Data Entity Get Entity Name.description: Returns a string representing the logical name of the entity for the record.

Data Entity Get Entity Reference.description: Returns a lookup value that references the record.

Data Entity Get Id.description: Returns a string representing the GUID value for the record.

Data Entity Get Is Dirty.description: Gets a boolean value indicating whether any fields in the form have been modified.

Data Entity Get Primary Attribute Value.description: Gets a string for the value of the primary attribute of the entity.

Data Entity Is Valid.description: Gets a boolean value indicating whether all of the entity data is valid.

Data Entity Remove On Save.description: Removes a function to be called when form data is loaded.

Data Entity Save.description: Saves the record synchronously with the options to close the form or open a new form after the save is completed.

Data Entity Add On Process Status Change.description: Adds a function as an event handler for the OnProcessStatusChange event so that it will be called when the business process flow status changes.

Data Entity Add On Stage Change.description: Adds a function as an event handler for the OnStageChange event so that it will be called when the business process flow stage changes.

Data Entity Add On Stage Selected.description: Adds a function as an event handler for the OnStageSelected event so that it will be called when a business process flow stage is selected.

Data Entity Remove On Process Status Cha.description: Removes an event handler from the OnProcessStatusChange event.

Data Entity Remove On Stage Change.description: Removes an event handler from the OnStageChange event.

Data Entity Remove On Stage Selected.description: Removes an event handler from the OnStageSelected event.

Data Process Get Active Process.description: Returns a Process object representing the active process.

Data Process Set Active Process.description: Sets a Process as the active process.

Data Process Get Enabled Processes.description: Asynchronously retrieves the business process flows enabled for an entity that the current user can switch to.

Data Process Get Process Instances.description: Returns all the process instances for the entity record that the calling user has access to.

Data Process Set Active Process Instance.description: Sets a process instance as the active instance.

Data Process Get Instance Id.description: Returns the unique identifier of the process instance.

Data Process Get Instance Name.description: Returns the name of the process instance.

Data Process Get Status.description: Returns the current status of the process instance.

Data Process Set Status.description: Sets the current status of the active process instance.
